product_name: APPALACHIAN TRAIL CONSERVANCY Keystone Trails Association Appalachian Trail Map - Delaware Water Gap to Swatara Gap
long_description: Double-sided map covers sections 1 through 6 of the Appalachian Trail across Pennsylvania and shows informal hiking trails in the vicinity of the AT.
short_description: Double-sided map covers sections 1 through 6 of the Appalachian Trail across Pennsylvania and shows informal hiking trails in the vicinity of the AT.
